name: Ludophobic Llama - Plant Pot Hero
description:
Ukie 2021 Student Games Jam Entry by Ludophobic Llama. 

Made With Unreal Engine 4.25.3

The topic of the Ukie students game jam was “Water”.  This topic is huge and has a constantly growing importance behind it. Therefore we thought to make a nice and relaxing atmosphere work in a stylised art style inspired by some examples of older games and animations. In our final concept, water is an essential resource that you need to use to help your flowers grow and keep the water crystal clear. 

Plant Pot Hero was a nice break from our current university unit and a lovely change compared to our other projects. All team members put many efforts and souls into this project, bringing it alive and vibrant.
